scripts.lint: npm run eslint; npm run htmllint; npm run csslint; npm run spellcheck
scripts.lint-fix: npm run eslint-fix; npm run htmllint; npm run csslint-fix
scripts.typecheck: npx tsc --noEmit --project jsconfig.json --pretty false 2>&1 | grep -v '^js/lib/' > /tmp/typecheck-out.txt; if grep -q 'error TS' /tmp/typecheck-out.txt; then cat /tmp/typecheck-out.txt; exit 1; fi

version-constraints.eslint: Cannot upgrade to v10 until eslint-plugin-jsdoc adds support (currently supports ^7 || ^8 || ^9). Track: https://github.com/gajus/eslint-plugin-jsdoc/issues
version-constraints.eslint-plugin-editorconfig: ^4.0.3 required for ESLint 9+ flat config compatibility
version-constraints.notes: Check 'npm outdated' regularly. Use 'npm audit' with caution - many vulnerabilities are in dev dependencies and don't affect production. See https://overreacted.io/npm-audit-broken-by-design/
